# 超级泡泡学

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/chaoji-paopaoxue
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/chaoji-paopaoxue
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install chaoji-paopaoxue
chaoji-paopaoxue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g chaoji-paopaoxue
chaoji-paopaoxue <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
